meaningMnemonic:
When you <kanji>describe</kanji> an event by <kanji>mention</kanji>ing everything that happened, you must be <vocabulary>giving an account</vocabulary> of it.

叙述 refers to <vocabulary>narrating</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>describing</vocabulary> events in an orderly sequence. It usually suggests a specific writing technique associated with storytelling and narrative.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
